content:
Both UniQlo and Kathmandu often have sales and discounts during the winter season. Here are some tips to help you score some great deals:

**UniQlo:**

* UniQlo usually has a winter sale in June or July, with discounts on their Heattech and winter clothing range.
* They often offer a "Buy One, Get One Free" deal on Heattech items during this time.
* Keep an eye on their website and social media for promo codes and special offers.
* Sign up for their newsletter to receive exclusive discounts and early access to sales.

**Kathmandu:**

* Kathmandu typically has a winter sale in May or June, with discounts on a wide range of winter gear and clothing.
* They often offer a "20% off everything" sale during this time, or discounts on specific categories like jackets or pants.
* Look out for their "Deal of the Week" promotions, which can offer significant discounts on popular items.
* Join their Summit Club loyalty program to receive exclusive discounts, early access to sales, and other benefits.

**General Tips:**

* Keep an eye on both UniQlo and Kathmandu's websites, as well as their social media and email newsletters, for sale announcements and promo codes.
* Sign up for their loyalty programs or email newsletters to receive exclusive discounts and early access to sales.
* Consider shopping during off-peak hours or on weekdays to avoid crowds and long lines.
* If you're a student, ask about student discounts or special offers.
* Don't be afraid to negotiate or ask about price matching if you find a better deal elsewhere.

By keeping an eye out for these sales and discounts, you can score some great deals on winter gear and clothing from UniQlo and Kathmandu. Happy shopping!
